description: Luna Shipping and Enterprises Ltd Vs The Motor Tanker "Agros" and Agros Shipping Company Limited before Hon. K.K.A.V. SWARNADHIPATHI J
parties: Luna Shipping and Enterprises Ltd Vs The Motor Tanker "Agros" and Agros Shipping Company Limited
keywords: The test to be followed by the High Court in a counterclaim is a low-level test or a high-level test. • Can the Court order to furnish security in a counterclaim by the defendant? • The test of prima facia case.
legistation: Section 2(1)(h) of the Admiralty Jurisdiction Act No.40 of 1983
